721778f-b.text:
(1)
Mt. Morris Park, eastern side, view east, showing the Russian Orthodox Church of Christ the Saviour (originally the Pilgrim Congregational Church), at Madison Avenue and 121st Street,
in the background.
July 24, 1932.
P. 1  .. Sperr.
(2)
The same, closer to the church.
July 24, 1932.
P. L. Sperr.

721779f-a.text:
Mt. Morris Park, south side (120th Street) view northeast, showing the old Pilgrim Church in the background. This church was origi built for the Congregationists of Harlem, but has lost its origir congregation, and is, at the time of this picture, the Russian
Qrthodox Church of Christ the Saviour.
July 25, 1932.
P. L. Sperr.
